sentences.en: Article 42 The architect � � s commendation may take the following form.
sentences.cn: 第42条(建筑师之奖励方式)建筑师之奖励如左.

sentences.en: Go through your files and look for letters of commendation, awards, etc. you earned in your industry.
sentences.cn: 检查你所有的个人文件，寻找在你的行业中所获得的推荐信，奖励等等。

sentences.en: He had a commendation for bravery.
Her painting won a commendation from the teacher.
sentences.cn: 她的画博得老师的赞扬.
他的行为应该受到嘉奖.

sentences.en: His dearest friends could not be dissatisfied with such commendation as that.
sentences.cn: 他的最亲密的朋友也不会对这样的称赞感到不满意.

sentences.en: I am flattered by his commendation.
Its main semantic characteristics are commendation, implicitness and vividness.
sentences.cn: 褒义性 、 含蓄性、生动性和形象性是其主要的语义特征.
后来, 佩特罗尼受到正式嘉奖.

sentences.en: Not a few readers wrote letters of commendation to the magazine.
sentences.cn: 相当多的读者给杂志社写表扬信.

sentences.en: The Company received a commendation from the Royal Society of Arts.
sentences.cn: 公司受到了皇家艺术协会的赞扬。

sentences.en: Those who will accept of my love and esteem must submit to my open commendation.
sentences.cn: 想受到我的爱和尊重的人,必须接受我的坦率的夸奖.

sentences.en: You deserve a commendation for having done something good.
sentences.cn: 你因为做了好事,应该得到表扬.

sentences.en: You were up for a letter of commendation.

words.tran_cn: 值得赞美的；很好的；可推荐的

trans.tran_en: an official statement praising someone, especially someone who has been brave or very successful
